summary:
This mod reference from famous characters’s clothes and make these clothes in the skyrim.
Just use NMM or MO install this mod to play.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][u]Spontaneous Works[/u][/size][/color][/b][/center]
[size=3]This mod reference from famous characters’s clothes and make these clothes in the skyrim.[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Installation Instructions[/size][/color]
This mod (K’)is only for male characters.
Just use NMM or MO install this mod to play.

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Notes[/size][/color]
The armor(K’) are categorized as Dragonscale armor.
The way to smith is the same as dragonscale.

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Necessity[/size][/color]
This mod will need these esm files:

3DLC(Dawnguard+HearthFires+Dragonborn)
SKSE
SSME
 
[color=#ffff00][size=5]About update[/size][/color]
[color=#e69138][size=4]Armors in this mod will be added or fixed at not the same time.
I will try my best to do this mod and update this mod.
Hope you to look forward to this mod.[/size][/color]
 
English is not my native language.So youmay be hard to read my sentences.
I feel sorry.
Thank you for reading the contents and use this mod~
Have fun~~
author: LouisWolf
